name: Longcat
description: SHIRO (Longcat) is a community-driven meme token based on one of the earliest internet memes, Longcat (2004). The project aims to revive meme culture in crypto by giving tribute to a legendary figure that predates even Doge and Pepe. SHIRO has no presale, no VCs, and no taxes â€” it is fully owned by the community. With a focus on decentralization and grassroots participation, the project is actively building a social ecosystem through memes, Telegram raids, and Twitter campaigns. SHIRO is not just a token, but a cultural movement to remind crypto what memes truly are.
